Arabic , English .
Akkasah: Photography Archive (NYU Abu Dhabi)
H.E Butti Bin Bishr Collection
Butti Bin Bishr, H.E.
Al Falasi Maryam
AD.MC.093
723 Photographic Prints 470 loose photographic prints, 1 negative and 7 albums containing 252 photographic prints. Mainly colour photographs with some black and white. Some with significant curling or warping, but none that prohibit digitization.
36 Leaves 36 letters, memos, certificates and ID documents
Circa 1960 - 1975 AD_MC_093
Content Description
A (digital surrogate) collection of 723 photographs and 36 related documents from the collection of H.E. Butti Bin Bishr, created and collected during his time working in the court of H.H. Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan in the 1960s and early 1970s.
Biographical / Historical
HE Butti Bin Bishr, who was born on Muharram 21, 1360 AH (May 18, 1941 AD), passed away on Rabi al Awwal 1432 (February 22, 2011). After working as the director of the Oman Bank in Al Ain, HE Butti Bin Bishr occupied a number of different administrative positions at the court of the late HH Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, before becoming private secretary and then the director of his Office.
Conditions Governing Use
Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) are held by Maryam Al Falasi, the collection owner. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from them via the repository. Please contact Akkasah: Photography Archive at NYUAD at akkasah@nyu.edu or complete the image request form at akkasah.org
Conditions Governing Access
Digital surrogates only are held by the repository. Please contact Akkasah Photography Archive, akkasah@nyu.edu +971 2628 5531
